title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration enabling Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to your local Ollama instance; markdown, code highlighting, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async generate, chat, pull, list models with POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed generate/chat/embed APIs with tokio streams.

title: Ollama-Gateway
summary: Built-in OpenAI-compatible endpoints (/v1/chat/completions, /v1/embeddings) inside Ollama binary.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot proxy that routes completions through your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with one-liner run commands and compose examples.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps ollama-rs for ergonomic model management and REPL chats.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, etc., with quantization specs.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG chatbot using Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions with your private Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official Ollama JavaScript SDK; weekly download stats and changelog.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI landing for ollama Python package; quickstart, version history, and wheel downloads.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama-based projects.
